This app is meant to be used by ophthalmologists. This app uses artificial intelligence to recommend the power of the intraocular lens to be used in a cataract surgery.
Pre-surgery calculations: A surgeon may use this page before the surgery to calculate the power of the intraocular lens to be given to a patient.
Surgery-day data entry: A surgeon may use this page to enter information just after conducting a surgery.
Post-surgery follow-up: A surgeon may use this page to enter the post-surgery refractive error on the day a patient comes for a follow-up.
This app uses artificial intelligence and improves by studying the data submitted by surgeons.
